body: I'm worried about this. It makes the function not re-entrant anymore. If an error is thrown before the final `sol_` near the end of this function, it is transposed forever! This can very well happen if input is half type or integral types because of the `AT_DISPATCH_FLOATING_TYPES` below. Can we not use the inplace version?
